amendment.description: An amendment numbered 42 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to reduce funds for the Office of the Secretary by $10 million and transfers funds to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
